summary: Client login and notification system with admin panel for managing client notifications
architectural_notes: Client authentication system with persistent login capability
User profile management with session control
Notification system supporting both global and individual client messages
Admin panel with client management and notification broadcast features

existing_features.title: Add a 'Stay Connected' checkbox to the client login page that persists the client's authentication session using localStorage instead of sessionStorage when checked
Create a profile menu in the top-right corner of the client dashboard that displays the client's name and a disconnect button when clicked
Add a notification bell icon in the client dashboard that displays global announcements when clicked
Add UI in the admin panel's client management section to send individual notifications to specific clients
Display individual client notifications in the notification bell dropdown on the client dashboard, showing both global announcements and client-specific notifications

new_feature_requests.summary: Add backend functionality to store and retrieve individual notifications for specific clients

projectName: Add stay connected option, profile menu, notification bell, and individual client notifications
